name: The Three Kings Meeting of 1914
obverse: Busts of the three kings, two facing left, one facing right. The coat of arms of the three countries below. Flowers next to the busts.
reverse: The meeting house in Malmö with flag flying. The coat of arms of the city are below.
reverse_inscriptions: MINNE AF KUNGAMÖTET I MALMÖ 18-19 DEC·1914
description: The kings of Denmark, Norway, and Sweden met in Malmö in 1914 to discuss WWI.
They all agreed to a policy of neutrality.
